calculations.name: Discount Tier
calculations.tableau_expression: IF [Discount Health]>0.25 THEN "High Discount" ELSEIF  [Discount Health]>0.10 THEN "Medium Discount" ELSE "Low Discont" END

calculation_context.Expression: IF [Discount Health]>0.25 THEN "High Discount" ELSEIF  [Discount Health]>0.10 THEN "Medium Discount" ELSE "Low Discont" END
